short_summary: Installation of a 33kW Grid-Tied Solar Array
description: Solar Power Plant Installation for Public Works Department
full_summary:
=====================================

**Title:** [Solar Photovoltaic Ground Mount Array] ITT
**ID:** WS4382586691-Doc4467703505

(Note:) This notice is for qualified contractors only who have been invited to participate in this project through a pre-qualification process. See page 2 of this document for details.

### Invitation To Qualify (ITQ) Details

**Process Type:** Competitive – Open Bidding
**Title:** Invitation to Qualify
**Closing Date:** March 19, 2024 (12:00 PM);
**Procurement Category:** Services (CNST)
**Regions of Delivery:** Nova Scotia, Canada

### Procurement Overview:

This contracting opportunity is inviting shortlisted companies to compete for a component under this single procurement process. The project consists of securing the general construction services of a new grid-tied ground-mounted solar array – a 33 kW solar project, located in Canso, Nova Scotia, Canada. The solar panel system will be connected to the existing Canso Canal electrical distribution system.

### Scope of Work:

The successful contractor is expected to provide all necessary resources to construct the solar panel array from scratch and connect it to the existing electrical system. Note that all government controls and safety regulations will be strictly enforced.

**Objective Selection Criteria:**
This procurement will use the Lowest Price method.    We have exclusive rights to choosing the best value method should it be required.
